CHAT.comment: Chi talks about his name during task (Christopher Columbus , etc)
to Jacob , how are you doing. I like going to your house. I hop you liked going over my house. Love Chris

context notes say Mot and Chi are sitting at the kitchen table; Chi has to deal with a lot of distractions (birds are flying around the room and making a lot of noise , MOT walks in and out to take care of Bro) but still manages to persevere and write a good letter. Chi gets help from EXP when Mot leaves the room , including telling him to sign letter. Chi decides who to write to but asks for Mot's help on what to write. She makes suggestions about punctuation but insists that Chi decide on the text himself <write something that comes to mind when you think of Jacob>; Chi seems to write slowly and carefully , and his spelling is quite good

u.a: aft slaps new pencil down on table

g.ga: the picture on the pencil maybe

u.a: Chi writes to in front of <Jacob>
MOT takes pencil and guides Chi's hand to make comma
Chi puts his head in his hands then looks off into space
leaves the room to go get Bro from school bus
MOT and Bro come back in from outside
comes in and takes off coat
erases the g which he had made incorrectly
drawn out as if two syllables
walks out of the room again
said softly under his breath while writing the words
writes over at the very end of the line
points with pencil to each word
points with pencil to each word as he reads
